sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() //this is a static data , later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) // destructure properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews) //format date const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' }; return (

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated') : (({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price} / per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* =========== tour review section ==========*/}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map((review, index) => (
Mark

{new Date("05-25-2023").toLocaleDateString("en-US", options)}

5
Amazing tour
))}
{/* =========== tour review section END ==========*/}
) } export default TourDetails
